entry.title: Wolf Among Flowers
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,949Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 289

Summary: “Gerard wanted me to think you were cruel—crueler than him, actually.” Derek stood to his full height, taking a step closer to Stiles as he placed his thumb and forefinger against Stiles’ chin. He was gentle in his prompting—the gentlest he had been since the last time he had held Cora as a baby. “I would never make you hunt. I would never make you kill.” Stiles blinked, his mouth partially parting. But he didn’t know what to say. “I never wish that feeling on anyone,” Derek finally stated, dropping his hand from Stiles. ~*~ Or Beauty and the Beast vibes, also known as the one where scarred, battle weary Prince Derek Hale is married by proxy to the adorable, bookworm scholar Stiles Stilinski.

Summary: Au Regency Romance 1820 England. Explicit M/M sex scenes. Viscount Derek Hale has a notorious reputation as a dallier, a trifler, a breaker of Omega hearts and tarnisher of reputatiions, yet devishly handsome, charming and good -natured he is adored by London society. He is the type of aristocratic Alpha young Omega dabeutantes are warned to avoid at all costs. Stiles Stilinski is the 16 year old Omega son of Baron Noah Stilinski and his wife, Claudia. Taken to London for his debut into The Season and make a 'perfect match', Stiles is strenuously warned against any association with Viscount Hale by his cousin and Mother. Accepted into The Ton, Stiles inevitably meets Viscount Hale and more than sparks fly. Can Stiles preserve his and his family's reputation and tame a wild heart or become another notch on the Viscount's bedpost?

entry.title: 'cause being your punchline still is something
entry.summary:
Author: whiry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,640Chapters: 12/21Kudos: 157

Summary: Born into a world of the supernatural and forced to segregate himself and his human peers from the supernatural creatures that inhabit Beacon Hills, Stiles grew up with the belief that integration was the key to a better life, thanks to his mother’s social work. Of course, that belief is only furthered by the mate mark he bears of his mate’s first words to him, something only supernatural creatures and their occasional human mates are supposed to have. Desperate to find his mate and carry on his mother’s work after her death, Stiles does everything in his power to unite his town, even if that means enduring dinners with Derek Hale, who hates him and refuses to speak to him. After a terse interaction, Derek finally speaks and the two realize they’re mates. Well, surely Stiles can still get his happy ending. Right?

entry.title: The Loquacious Fingers
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,133Chapters: 8/11Kudos: 161

Summary: Derek Hale didn’t expect getting lost in his own neighborhood to change anything—until the night he frightened a stranger in a dark alley without meaning to. Stiles Stilinski is deaf, skittish, stubborn, all sharp eyes and quiet panic, a notebook clutched to his chest, and a silence Derek doesn’t understand until much later. Soon Stiles is stepping into Derek’s messy loft, borrowing his books, drinking his tea, and filling Derek’s quiet spaces with the warm, steady presence Derek didn’t know he needed. Things begin to get tricky when Derek realizes that his erotic stories more and more star Stiles instead of the usual sexy female heroine. But everything's under control until one day, Stiles is curled on Derek’s couch reading the manuscript he never intended anyone to see. Derek isn’t sure what terrifies him more: getting lost in the dark with no one to help him or Stiles recognizing the pieces of himself hidden in the pages.

entry.title: Crimson Veil
entry.summary:
Author: GrimReaperlover11

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,694Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Stiles has lived for centuries, and in that time, he has mastered the art of power exchange. As the clinical, ancient vampire owner and Dom of The Crimson Veil, an exclusive, subterranean club where supernaturals explore their deepest desires, Stiles sees everything, and he controls all. He operates on the certainty that true freedom lies in the choice to relinquish control.His kingdom, however, is lacking a challenge, until Derek Hale walks through the archway.Derek is an Alpha. A powerful werewolf whose every instinct screams command. Yet, beneath the heavy mantle of leadership, Derek is suffocating, desperately yearning for a force strong enough to take the reins and relieve him of his overwhelming burden.Stiles spots the raw, beautiful agony in the Alpha's eyes immediately. He sees the king who aches to drop his crown. Their first encounter is a silent, charged collision of immovable dominance and desperate denial, culminating in Derek’s explosive, fear-fueled growl, a sound that, to Stiles, is merely a magnificent challenge.This isn't a quick claim; it's a centuries-old predator recognizing his ultimate prey.But will Derek allow himself to be hunted?
